name: Breakout Kings (Season 1)
summary:
In order to catch escaped convicts, a squad of U.S. Marshals makes a special deal with several current prisoners . If they agree to help, their sentences will be reduced by one month and they will be transferred to a minimum-security facility. However, if any of them should try to escape, they will all be returned to their original prisons and their sentences will be doubled.
两位蛋疼法警收编了一些能力出众的服刑期内犯人组成了一个快速反应，专门抓捕脱狱犯的小队；自然有奖也有罚，就看谁能向自由的翅膀妥协囉

eps.name: Pilot
eps.desc: When convicted murderer August Tillman escapes from prison, Veteran U.S. Marshals Charlie DuChamp and Ray Zancanelli decide to take an unorthodox approach to fugitive apprehension by forming a special task force composed of the three most elusive fugitives they have ever captured. Convicts Lloyd Lowery, Philomena Rotchcliffer and Shea Daniels agree to assist in the case in exchange for time off their sentences.

eps.name: Collected
eps.desc: A criminal that proclaims his innocense escapes during a protest on the night of another inmate's execution. Meanwhile Phillie breaks her end of the bargain, and gets sent back to maximum security. A new female convict, Erica Reed, is enlisited to replace her, as the Breakout Kings hunt down the prisoner. Along the way, they discover he is guilty as sin, and has a long history of tortuting women.

eps.name: The Bag Man
eps.desc: The Breakout Kings must hunt down one of the most dangerous and volitile fugitives yet, especially as the body count rises in the longer he remains at large. But are they ready for Theodore "T-Bag" Bagwell?
